body:
C'mon just fap already!
Too much think isn't good to your dick
Oh man this was a stretch! It was pretty damn funny.
In this scenario, not cumming inside is probably illegal so I was hoping he wouldn't cum inside then get arrested for using the debauchery license for nonreproductive sex.

@Vacha Why would you even relate to this? Just imagine you're a voyeur and you're just watching this, no reason at all to imagine yourself into this scenario per say, are you unsecure of your girlfriends?! About the doujin, it could've been a little longer and pregnancy is COMPLETELY unnecessary (as always), 'till this day i don't know why japanese people are so into pregnancy as form of pornography...

In my fantasy, if I'm in this scenario I will kill the man. Yeah there will be investigation, but who else will know in the room. The internet is a powerful thing. If you motivate the people that got there girlfriend or lover rape, A small motivation can cause a riot and death across the country.
I think people just don't like the fiction. The art is nice, but I won't come back and read it.
It's always refreshing to read  the comments of morons who can't separate fiction from reality.
If The nation has to resort to force f*ck  to produce kid(s) then no one would bother to marriage or have a relationship, just wait for the government to say who to f*ck… *Sigh*
I dont feel the ntr .the plot just bad

It's good but far from perfect. The concept of rape being a solution for a declining birth rate is wrong. The idea is good but it choose a wrong answer. But hey it's hentai, there are people out there that will tell that you shouldn't judge and just fap.

TL;DR

Plot is bullshit
I personally would have favored the story where the protagonist kills that guy, but oh well, the drawing was on point for me

the idea comes from reality in japan, but the plot twist is bending the truth: the chance of rape to be happened in japan is only 1%. draw this, could it lead to the increasing in criminal ? (sorry if i'm silly, but i don't like this doujin for its potential, and i take things like problems in japan seriously). it's the first shot that cause chaos in japan
the idea itself is unique.. but the mindbreak is forced
lol the plot was so forced
